parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: InstanceChargeTypes
parameters.description:
实例付费类型枚举值：
- ONDEMAND: 按量付费实例
- SPOT: 竞价实例
默认为null代表全选
举例: ["ONDEMAND", "SPOT"]

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the request to retrieve a new page of results.

parameters.name: NodeGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the node group.

parameters.name: ScalingActivityStates
parameters.description: The status of the scaling activity. Number of elements in the array: 1-20.

parameters.name: ScalingActivityType
parameters.description:
The type of the scaling activity. Valid values:

*   SCALE_OUT
*   SCALE_IN

parameters.name: ScalingRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the scaling rule.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.
